titleStmt.title: By the Commissioners for the government of Scotland, and the Isles thereunto belonging
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Christopher Higgins, in Harts Close, over against the Trone Church,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Given under our Hands at Holy-Rood-House this eleventh day of May, in the year of our Lord, one thousand six hundred and sixty. Signed: Tho. Morgan [and three others].
Order to print dated: Friday the eleventh of May, 1660. Signed: Silas Taylor, Clerk to the Commissioners.
Publishing the appointment of the Commissioners, and continuing in office all Justices of the Peace, Sheriffs and Commissaries who were in office on 4 April 1659.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.

place.placeName: Harts Close, over against the Trone Church
